1.12.1.7.0:
Make all teleporters half-slabs
Make entity teleportation work cross-dimensionally
Force load chunks before teleporting to them
Fix teleporter UI offset
Make teleporter custom names form a seperate network
1.12.1.6.3-beta5: Fixed ender teleporters not working with unloaded dimensions

1.12.1.6.3-beta1: Changed recipe registration to work with Forge 2324 and later
